Haha Rockstar Nakamoto, I've always adored recording behinds and when I got notification of Yuta recordings I was so exited, really loved this and enjoyed a lot, I smiled so much when I better realised that he was recording his own solo songs, which he wrote and composed. And the fact that recordings was made in Korea, yuta even rented a studio for recordings, it's not SM and then recordings was sent in Japan and adjusted here. I'm with you Rockstar Nakamoto, let's walk side by side on your crazy journey! Can't wait until your next release!
